title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.6 - Odometers with digital readouts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.6 - Odometers with digital readouts

State Regulations
(a) If an odometer with a digital readout
relies on electronic impulses, the retentive memory must be capable of
retaining mileage readings for at least four years without power from an
external source. (b) Notwithstanding any other provision of this Part, a 1993 or 1994 model year
vehicle may show nonnumerical indicators instead of numbers when the numerical
limit is exceeded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
60.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
